CustomField.formula: IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow1.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Missing Goods Receipt', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow2.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Price Variance', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow3.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Quantity Variance', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow4.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Functional Correctness', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow5.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Unplanned Delivery Cost', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow6.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for FI Workflows (non-PO related invoices)', IF(Workflow__c == $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.ICOWorkflow8.Name__c, Workflow__c + ' - Approval for Price Check', '')))))))
CustomField.label: Summary
